Lyric:
[by:funnyperk]
[ti:]

[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:18.89]I promise that I'll hold you when it's cold out
[00:23.42]When we loose our winter coats in the spring
[00:28.00]Cause lately I was thinking I never told you
[00:32.49]That every time I see you my heart sings

[00:37.13]Cause we lived at the carnival in summer
[00:41.88]We scared ourselves to death on a ghost train
[00:46.37]And just like every ferris wheel stops turning
[00:50.56]Oh I guess we had an expiration date
[00:55.28]So I won't say I love you, it's too late

[00:59.97]And oooooooooh
[01:04.60]Ooooohohoooooh
[01:09.04]And oooohoooooooh
[01:13.22]Ohoooohohohoooooh
[01:18.41]Cause every time I saw you I got nervous
[01:22.69]Shivering and shaking at the knees
[01:27.24]And just like every song I haven't heard yet no
[01:31.78]I didn't know the words in front of me
[01:35.77]In front of me, and oooooooh
[01:40.35]But I don't wanna know

[01:44.94]Who'll take you home?
[01:48.93]Who'll take you home?
[01:53.52]Who'll take you home?
[01:57.15]Hoooooome
[02:01.85]And oooooohhhhh
[02:06.38]And oooooohhhhh
[02:10.84]And oooooohhhhh
[02:15.03]Oooooooohooooohoohhhh

[02:20.16]Now that you're on someone else's shoulders
[02:24.75]The winter winds are colder on my own
[02:29.28]Maybe we will meet when we get older
[02:33.81]So I won't say I love you if you don't
[03:10.39]So I won't say I love you if you don't
